nodes.text: Dagger was a group of two Assassin-class corvettes used by the Galactic Empire.

They were attacked by type 2 mines deployed by the Rebel MC40a Light Calamari Cruiser Planka. However, two Missile Boats arrived and destroyed the mines, allowing a transport to dock and repair the two corvettes. The incident was recorded for future simulation missions for pilots, namely Maarek Stele.
